   20: 
   21: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   22: %% Purpose:
   23: %%
   24: %% Test:    ts:run(snmp, snmp_log_SUITE, [batch]).
   25: %% Test:    ts:run(snmp, snmp_log_SUITE, log_to_txt2, [batch]).
   26: %% 
   27: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   28: -module(snmp_log_SUITE).
   29: 
   30: 
   31: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   32: %% Include files
   33: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   34: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   35: -include("snmp_test_lib.hrl").
   36: -define(SNMP_USE_V3, true).
   37: -include_lib("snmp/include/snmp_types.hrl").
   38: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   39: 
   40: 
   41: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   42: %% External exports
   43: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   44: -export([
   45:          suite/0, all/0, groups/0,
   46:          init_per_suite/1,    end_per_suite/1,
   47:          init_per_group/2,    end_per_group/2, 
   48:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   49: 
   50: 	 open_and_close/1,
   51: 	
   52: 	 open_write_and_close1/1,
   53: 	 open_write_and_close2/1,
   54: 	 open_write_and_close3/1,
   55: 	 open_write_and_close4/1,
   56: 	
   57: 	 log_to_io1/1,
   58: 	 log_to_io2/1,
   59: 	
   60: 	 log_to_txt1/1,
   61:   	 log_to_txt2/1,
   62:   	 log_to_txt3/1
   63: 	]).
   64: 
   65: 
   66: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   67: %% Internal exports
   68: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   69: -export([
   70: 	 log_writer_main/6,
   71: 	 log_reader_main/1,
   72: 	 next_seqno/2
   73:         ]).
   74: 
   75: 
   76: %%======================================================================
   77: %% Common Test interface functions
   78: %%======================================================================
   79: 
   80: suite() -> 
   81:     [{ct_hooks, [ts_install_cth]}].
   82: 
   83: all() -> 
   84:     [
   85:      open_and_close, 
   86:      {group, open_write_and_close},
   87:      {group, log_to_io}, 
   88:      {group, log_to_txt}].
   89: 
   90: groups() -> 
   91:     [
   92:      {open_write_and_close, [], owac_cases()},
   93:      {log_to_io,            [], l2i_cases()},
   94:      {log_to_txt,           [], l2t_cases()}
   95:     ].
   96: 
   97: 
   98: owac_cases() ->
   99:     [
  100:      open_write_and_close1,
  101:      open_write_and_close2,
  102:      open_write_and_close3,
  103:      open_write_and_close4
  104:     ].
  105: 
  106: l2i_cases() ->
  107:     [
  108:      log_to_io1,
  109:      log_to_io2
  110:     ].
  111: 
  112: l2t_cases() ->
  113:     [
  114:      log_to_txt1,
  115:      log_to_txt2,
  116:      log_to_txt3
  117:     ].
  118: 
  119: 
  120: 
  121: %%
  122: %% -----
  123: %%
  124: 
  125: init_per_suite(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
  126:     case ?LIB:init_per_suite(Config0) of
  127:         {skip, _} = SKIP ->
  128:             SKIP;
  129: 
  130:         Config1 when is_list(Config1) ->
  131:             snmp_test_sys_monitor:start(),
  132:             Config1
  133:     end.
  134: 
  135: end_per_suite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  136:     snmp_test_sys_monitor:stop(),
  137:     ?LIB:end_per_suite(Config).
  138: 
  139: 
  140: 
  141: %%
  142: %% -----
  143: %%
  144: 
  145: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  146:     Config.
  147: 
  148: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  149:     Config.
  150: 
  151: 
  152: 
  153: %%
  154: %% -----
  155: %%
  156: 
  157: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  158: 
  159:     snmp_test_global_sys_monitor:reset_events(),
  160:     
  161:     Dir        = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  162:     LogTestDir = join(Dir,        ?MODULE),
  163:     CaseDir    = join(LogTestDir, Case),
  164:     case file:make_dir(LogTestDir) of
  165: 	ok ->
  166: 	    ok;
  167: 	{error, eexist} ->
  168: 	    ok;
  169: 	Error ->
  170: 	    ?FAIL({failed_creating_subsuite_top_dir, Error})
  171:     end,
  172:     ok = file:make_dir(CaseDir),
  173:     Dog = ?WD_START(?MINS(5)),
  174:     [{log_dir, CaseDir}, {watchdog, Dog}|Config].
  175: 
  176: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  177: 
  178:     ?IPRINT("system events during test: "
  179:             "~n   ~p", [snmp_test_global_sys_monitor:events()]),
  180: 
  181:     %% Leave the dirs created above (enable debugging of the test case(s))
  182:     Dog = ?config(watchdog, Config),
  183:     ?WD_STOP(Dog),
  184:     lists:keydelete(watchdog, 1, Config).
  185: 
  186: 
  187: 
  188: %%======================================================================
  189: %% Test functions
  190: %%======================================================================
  191: 
  192: open_and_close(suite) -> [];
  193: open_and_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  194:     ?P(open_and_close),
  195:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  196:     Pre  = fun() ->
  197:                    put(sname,     ?FUNCTION_NAME),
  198:                    put(verbosity, trace),
  199:                    ?config(log_dir, Config)
  200:            end,
  201:     TC   = fun(Dir) ->
  202:                    do_open_and_close(Dir)
  203:            end,
  204:     Post = fun(_) ->
  205:                    ok
  206:            end,
  207:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
  208: 
  209: do_open_and_close(Dir) ->
  210:     Name   = "snmp_test",
  211:     File   = join(Dir, "snmp_test.log"),
  212:     Size   = {1024, 10},
  213:     Repair = true,
  214:     ?IPRINT("~w -> create log", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  215:     {ok, Log} = snmp_log:create(Name, File, Size, Repair),
  216:     ?IPRINT("~w -> sync log", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  217:     ok = snmp_log:sync(Log),
  218:     ?IPRINT("~w -> get (log) info", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  219:     {ok, Info} = snmp_log:info(Log),
  220:     ?IPRINT("~w -> display (log) info", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  221:     display_info(Info),
  222:     ?IPRINT("~w -> close log", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  223:     ok = snmp_log:close(Log),
  224:     ?IPRINT("~w -> done", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  225:     ok.
  226:     
  227: 
  228: %%======================================================================
  229: 
  230: open_write_and_close1(suite) -> 
  231:     [];
  232: open_write_and_close1(doc) -> 
  233:     "Open a plain (no sequence-numbering) log file";
  234: open_write_and_close1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  235:     ?P(?FUNCTION_NAME),
  236:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  237:     Pre  = fun() ->
  238:                    put(sname,     ?FUNCTION_NAME),
  239:                    put(verbosity, trace),
  240:                    ?config(log_dir, Config)
  241:            end,
  242:     TC   = fun(Dir) ->
  243:                    SeqNoGen = none, 
  244:                    ok = open_write_and_close(SeqNoGen, Dir)
  245:            end,
  246:     Post = fun(_) ->
  247:                    ok
  248:            end,
  249:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
  250:     
  251: 
  252: %%======================================================================
  253: 
  254: open_write_and_close2(suite) -> 
  255:     [];
  256: open_write_and_close2(doc) -> 
  257:     "Open a log file with sequence-numbering explicitly disabled";
  258: open_write_and_close2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  259:     ?P(?FUNCTION_NAME),
  260:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  261:     Pre  = fun() ->
  262:                    put(sname,     ?FUNCTION_NAME),
  263:                    put(verbosity, trace),
  264:                    ?config(log_dir, Config)
  265:            end,
  266:     TC   = fun(Dir) ->
  267:                    SeqNoGen = disabled, 
  268:                    ok = open_write_and_close(SeqNoGen, Dir)
  269:            end,
  270:     Post = fun(_) ->
  271:                    ok
  272:            end,
  273:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
  274: 
  275: 
  276: %%======================================================================
  277: 
  278: open_write_and_close3(suite) -> 
  279:     [];
  280: open_write_and_close3(doc) -> 
  281:     "Open a log file with sequence-numbering using MFA";
  282: open_write_and_close3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  283:     ?P(?FUNCTION_NAME),
  284:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  285:     Pre  = fun() ->
  286:                    put(sname,     ?FUNCTION_NAME),
  287:                    put(verbosity, trace),
  288:                    ?config(log_dir, Config)
  289:            end,
  290:     TC   = fun(Dir) ->
  291:                    seqno_init(), 
  292:                    SeqNoGen = {?MODULE, next_seqno, [10, 100]}, 
  293:                    ok = open_write_and_close(SeqNoGen, Dir)
  294:            end,
  295:     Post = fun(_) -> 
  296:                    seqno_finish()
  297:            end,
  298:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
  299: 
  300: 
  301: 
  302: %%======================================================================
  303: 
  304: open_write_and_close4(suite) -> 
  305:     [];
  306: open_write_and_close4(doc) -> 
  307:     "Open a log file with sequence-numbering using fun";
  308: open_write_and_close4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  309:     ?P(?FUNCTION_NAME),
  310:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  311:     Pre  = fun() ->
  312:                    put(sname,     ?FUNCTION_NAME),
  313:                    put(verbosity, trace),
  314:                    ?config(log_dir, Config)
  315:            end,
  316:     TC   = fun(Dir) ->
  317:                    seqno_init(), 
  318:                    SeqNoGen = fun() -> next_seqno(10, 100) end, 
  319:                    ok = open_write_and_close(SeqNoGen, Dir)
  320:            end,
  321:     Post = fun(_) ->
  322:                    seqno_finish()
  323:            end,
  324:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
  325: 
  326: 
  327: %%======================================================================
  328: 
  329: seqno_init() ->
  330:     ets:new(snmp_log_test_seqno_tab, [named_table, set, protected]).
  331: 
  332: seqno_finish() ->
  333:     ets:delete(snmp_log_test_seqno_tab).
  334: 
  335: next_seqno(Initial, Max) ->
  336:     Key       = seqno, 
  337:     Position  = 2, 
  338:     Increment = 1, 
  339:     Threshold = Max,
  340:     SetValue  = Initial, 
  341:     UpdateOp  = {Position, Increment, Threshold, SetValue},
  342:     Tab       = snmp_log_test_seqno_tab, 
  343:     case (catch ets:update_counter(Tab, Key, UpdateOp)) of
  344: 	{'EXIT', {badarg, _}} ->
  345: 	    ets:insert(Tab, {seqno, Initial}),
  346: 	    Initial;
  347: 	Next when is_integer(Next) ->
  348: 	    Next
  349:     end.
  350: 
  351: pretty_seqnogen(SeqNoGen) when is_atom(SeqNoGen) ->
  352:     atom_to_list(SeqNoGen);
  353: pretty_seqnogen({_Mod, _Func, _Args} = _SeqNoGen) ->
  354:     "tuple";
  355: pretty_seqnogen(SeqNoGen) when is_function(SeqNoGen) ->
  356:     "function".
  357:     
  358: open_write_and_close(SeqNoGen, Dir) ->
  359:     ?IPRINT("~w(~s) -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME, pretty_seqnogen(SeqNoGen)]),
  360: 
  361:     Name   = "snmp_test",
  362:     File   = join(Dir, "snmp_test.log"),
  363:     Size   = {1024, 10},
  364:     Repair = true,
  365: 
  366:     ?IPRINT("~w(~s) -> create log",
  367:             [?FUNCTION_NAME, pretty_seqnogen(SeqNoGen)]),
  368:     {ok, Log} =
  369: 	case SeqNoGen of
  370: 	    none -> 
  371: 		snmp_log:create(Name, File, Size, Repair);
  372: 	    _ ->
  373: 		snmp_log:create(Name, File, SeqNoGen, Size, Repair)
  374: 	end,
  375: 
  376:     Vsn       = 'version-2',
  377:     Community = "all-rights",
  378: 
  379:     ?IPRINT("~w(~s) -> create messages to log",
  380:             [?FUNCTION_NAME, pretty_seqnogen(SeqNoGen)]),
  381:     %% A request
  382:     Req = get_next_request(Vsn, Community, [1,1], 1, 235779012),
  383: 
  384:     %% A reply
  385:     Rep = get_response(Vsn, Community,
  386: 			     [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,1,0], 'OCTET STRING',
  387: 			     "Erlang SNMP agent", 1, 235779012),
  388:     
  389:     %% Create a list of messages to log:
  390:     Msgs = lists:flatten(lists:duplicate(1002,[Req,Rep])),
  391: 
  392:     %% And now log them:
  393:     ?IPRINT("~w(~s) -> log ~p messages, ~p bytes",
  394:             [?FUNCTION_NAME, pretty_seqnogen(SeqNoGen),
  395:              length(Msgs), size(list_to_binary(Msgs))]),
  396:     Addr = ?LOCALHOST(),
  397:     Port = 162,
  398:     Logger = fun(Packet) ->
  399: 		     ok = snmp_log:log(Log, Packet, Addr, Port)
  400: 	     end,
  401:     lists:foreach(Logger, Msgs),
  402:     ?IPRINT("~w(~s) -> check notify",
  403:             [?FUNCTION_NAME, pretty_seqnogen(SeqNoGen)]),
  404:     check_notify(),
  405:     
  406:     ?IPRINT("~w(~s) -> display (log) info",
  407:             [?FUNCTION_NAME, pretty_seqnogen(SeqNoGen)]),
  408:     {ok, Info} = snmp_log:info(Log),
  409:     display_info(Info),
  410: 
  411:     ?IPRINT("~w(~s) -> close log",
  412:             [?FUNCTION_NAME, pretty_seqnogen(SeqNoGen)]),
  413:     ?DBG("open_write_and_close1 -> close log", []),
  414:     ok = snmp_log:close(Log),
  415: 
  416:     ?IPRINT("~w(~s) -> done",
  417:             [?FUNCTION_NAME, pretty_seqnogen(SeqNoGen)]),
  418:     ok.
  419:     
  420: 
  421: 
  422: %%======================================================================
  423: 
  424: log_to_io1(suite) -> [];
  425: log_to_io1(doc) -> "Log to io from the same process that opened "
  426: 		       "and wrote the log";
  427: log_to_io1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  428:     ?P(?FUNCTION_NAME),
  429:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  430:     Pre  = fun() ->
  431:                    put(sname,     ?FUNCTION_NAME),
  432:                    put(verbosity, debug),
  433:                    ?config(log_dir, Config)
  434:            end,
  435:     TC   = fun(Dir) ->
  436:                    do_log_to_io1(Dir)
  437:            end,
  438:     Post = fun(_) ->
  439:                    ok
  440:            end,
  441:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
  442: 
  443: 
  444: do_log_to_io1(Dir) ->
  445:     ?IPRINT("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  446: 
  447:     Name   = "snmp_test_l2i1",
  448:     File   = join(Dir, "snmp_test_l2i1.log"),
  449:     Size   = {1024, 10},
  450:     Repair = true,
  451: 
  452:     ?IPRINT("~w -> create log", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  453:     {ok, Log} = snmp_log:create(Name, File, Size, Repair),
  454: 
  455:     ?IPRINT("~w -> create messages to log", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  456:     Msgs = messages(),
  457: 
  458:     ?IPRINT("~w -> create logger fun(s)", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  459:     Addr = ?LOCALHOST(),
  460:     Port = 162,
  461:     Logger = fun(Packet) ->
  462: 		     ok = snmp_log:log(Log, Packet, Addr, Port)
  463: 	     end,
  464:     BatchLogger = fun(Time) ->
  465: 			  lists:foreach(Logger, Msgs),
  466: 			  ?SLEEP(Time),
  467: 			  ok
  468: 		  end,
  469:     To = lists:duplicate(100, 100),
  470: 
  471:     ?IPRINT("~w -> log the messages", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  472:     lists:foreach(BatchLogger, To),
  473: 
  474:     ?IPRINT("~w -> get (log) info", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  475:     {ok, Info} = snmp_log:info(Log),
  476: 
  477:     ?IPRINT("~w -> display (log) info", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  478:     display_info(Info),
  479: 
  480:     ?IPRINT("~w -> do the convert to io (stdout)", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  481:     ? line ok = snmp:log_to_io(Dir, [], Name, File, false),
  482: 
  483:     ?IPRINT("~w -> close log", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  484:     ok = snmp_log:close(Log),
  485: 
  486:     ?IPRINT("~w -> done", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  487:     ok.
  488: 
  489: 
  490: %%======================================================================
  491: %% Start a logger-process that logs messages with a certain interval.
  492: %% Start a reader-process that reads messages from the log at a certain
  493: %% point in time.
  494: 
  495: log_to_io2(suite) -> [];
  496: log_to_io2(doc) -> "Log to io from a different process than which "
  497: 		       "opened and wrote the log";
  498: log_to_io2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  499:     ?P(?FUNCTION_NAME),
  500:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  501:     Pre  = fun() ->
  502:                    put(sname,     ?FUNCTION_NAME),
  503:                    put(verbosity, debug),
  504:                    Dir    = ?config(log_dir,     Config),
  505:                    Factor = ?config(snmp_factor, Config),
  506:                    {Dir, Factor}
  507:            end,
  508:     TC   = fun({Dir, Factor}) ->
  509:                    do_log_to_io2(Dir, Factor)
  510:            end,
  511:     Post = fun(_) ->
  512:                    ok
  513:            end,
  514:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
  515: 
  516: do_log_to_io2(Dir, Factor) ->
  517:     ?IPRINT("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  518: 
  519:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  520: 
  521:     Name   = "snmp_test_l2i2",
  522:     File   = join(Dir, "snmp_test_l2i2.log"),
  523:     Size   = {1024, 10},
  524:     Repair = true,
  525:     
  526:     ?IPRINT("~w -> create log writer process", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  527:     {ok, Log, Logger} =
  528:         log_writer_start(Name, File, Size, Repair, Factor),
  529: 
  530:     ?IPRINT("~w -> create log reader process", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  531:     {ok, Reader} = log_reader_start(),
  532: 
  533:     ?DBG("log_to_io2 -> wait some time", []),
  534:     ?SLEEP(5000),
  535: 
  536:     ?IPRINT("~w -> display log info", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  537:     log_writer_info(Logger),
  538: 
  539:     ?IPRINT("~w -> instruct the log writer to sleep some", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  540:     ok = log_writer_sleep(Logger, 5000),
  541: 
  542:     ?IPRINT("~w -> instruct the log reader to log to io", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  543:     Res = 
  544: 	log_reader_log_to(Reader, 
  545: 			  fun() -> 
  546: 				  I = disk_log:info(Log),
  547: 				  R = snmp:log_to_io(Dir, [], Name, File, true),
  548: 				  {R, I}
  549: 			  end),
  550: 
  551:     case Res of
  552: 	{ok, Info} ->
  553:             ?IPRINT("~w -> successs:"
  554:                     "~n   Info: ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Info]),
  555: 	    ok;
  556: 	{Error, Info} ->
  557:             ?EPRINT("~w -> failure:"
  558:                     "~n   Error: ~p"
  559:                     "~n   Info:  ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Error, Info]),
  560: 	    ?FAIL({log_lo_io_failed, Error, Info})
  561:     end,
  562: 
  563:     ?IPRINT("~w -> instruct the log writer to stop", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  564:     log_writer_stop(Logger),
  565: 
  566:     ?IPRINT("~w -> instruct the log reader to stop", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  567:     log_reader_stop(Reader),
  568: 
  569:     ?IPRINT("~w -> done", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  570:     ok.
  571: 
  572: 
  573: %%======================================================================
  574: 
  575: log_to_txt1(suite) -> [];
  576: log_to_txt1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  577:     ?P(?FUNCTION_NAME),
  578:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  579:     Pre  = fun() ->
  580:                    put(sname,     ?FUNCTION_NAME),
  581:                    put(verbosity, debug),
  582:                    ?config(log_dir, Config)
  583:            end,
  584:     TC   = fun(Dir) ->
  585:                    Name     = "snmp_test_l2t1",
  586:                    SeqNoGen = disabled, 
  587:                    log_to_txt(Name, SeqNoGen, Dir)
  588:            end,
  589:     Post = fun(_) ->
  590:                    ok
  591:            end,
  592:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
  593: 
  594: 
  595: %%======================================================================
  596: 
  597: log_to_txt2(suite) -> [];
  598: log_to_txt2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  599:     ?P(?FUNCTION_NAME),
  600:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  601:     Pre  = fun() ->
  602:                    put(sname,     ?FUNCTION_NAME),
  603:                    put(verbosity, debug),
  604:                    ?config(log_dir, Config)
  605:            end,
  606:     TC   = fun(Dir) ->
  607:                    Name = "snmp_test_l2t2",
  608:                    seqno_init(), 
  609:                    SeqNoGen = {?MODULE, next_seqno, [1, 100]}, 
  610:                    log_to_txt(Name, SeqNoGen, Dir)
  611:            end,
  612:     Post = fun(_) ->
  613:                    seqno_finish()
  614:            end,
  615:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
  616: 
  617: 
  618: %%======================================================================
  619: 
  620: log_to_txt(Name, SeqNoGen, Dir) ->
  621:     ?IPRINT("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  622: 
  623:     File   = join(Dir, Name ++ ".log"),
  624:     Size   = {10240, 10},
  625:     Repair = true,
  626: 
  627:     ?IPRINT("~w -> create log", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  628:     {ok, Log} =
  629: 	case SeqNoGen of
  630: 	    none -> 
  631: 		snmp_log:create(Name, File, Size, Repair);
  632: 	    _ ->
  633: 		snmp_log:create(Name, File, SeqNoGen, Size, Repair)
  634: 	end,
  635: 
  636:     ?IPRINT("~w -> create messages to log", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  637:     Msgs = messages(),
  638: 
  639:     ?IPRINT("~w -> create logger fun(s)", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  640:     Addr = ?LOCALHOST(),
  641:     Port = 162,
  642:     Logger = fun(Packet) ->
  643: 		     ok = snmp_log:log(Log, Packet, Addr, Port)
  644: 	     end,
  645:     BatchLogger = fun(Time) ->
  646: 			  lists:foreach(Logger, Msgs),
  647: 			  ?SLEEP(Time),
  648: 			  ok
  649: 		  end,
  650:     To = lists:duplicate(10, 5000),
  651: 
  652:     ?IPRINT("~w -> log the messages", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  653:     Start = calendar:local_time(),
  654:     lists:foreach(BatchLogger, To),
  655:     Stop  = calendar:local_time(),
  656: 
  657:     ?IPRINT("~w -> get (log) info", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  658:     {ok, Info} = snmp_log:info(Log),
  659:     ?IPRINT("~w -> display (log) info", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  660:     display_info(Info),
  661: 
  662:     Out1a = join(Dir, "snmp_text-1-unblocked.txt"),
  663:     ?IPRINT("~w -> do the convert to a text file (~s) unblocked",
  664:             [?FUNCTION_NAME, Out1a]),
  665:     ok = snmp:log_to_txt(Dir, [], Out1a, Log, File, false),
  666: 
  667:     {ok, #file_info{size = Size1a}} = file:read_file_info(Out1a),
  668:     ?IPRINT("~w -> text file size: ~p",
  669:             [?FUNCTION_NAME, Size1a]),
  670:     validate_size(Size1a),
  671: 
  672:     Out1b = join(Dir, "snmp_text-1-blocked.txt"),
  673:     ?IPRINT("~w -> do the convert to a text file (~s) blocked",
  674:             [?FUNCTION_NAME, Out1b]),
  675:     ok = snmp:log_to_txt(Dir, [], Out1b, Log, File, true),
  676: 
  677:     {ok, #file_info{size = Size1b}} = file:read_file_info(Out1b),
  678:     ?IPRINT("~w -> text file size: ~p",
  679:             [?FUNCTION_NAME, Size1b]),
  680:     validate_size(Size1b, {eq, Size1a}),
  681: 
  682:     Out2 = join(Dir, "snmp_text-2.txt"),
  683:     ?IPRINT("~w -> do the convert to a text file when"
  684:             "~n   Start: ~p"
  685:             "~n   Stop:  ~p"
  686:             "~n   Out2:  ~p",
  687:             [?FUNCTION_NAME, Start, Stop, Out2]),
  688:     ok = snmp:log_to_txt(Dir, [], Out2, Log, File, Start, Stop),
  689: 
  690:     {ok, #file_info{size = Size2}} = file:read_file_info(Out2),
  691:     ?IPRINT("~w -> text file size: ~p",
  692:             [?FUNCTION_NAME, Size2]),
  693:     validate_size(Size2, {le, Size1a}),
  694: 
  695:     %% Calculate new start / stop times...
  696:     GStart = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(Start),
  697:     ?IPRINT("~w -> GStart: ~p",
  698:             [?FUNCTION_NAME, GStart]),
  699:     GStop  = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(Stop),
  700:     ?IPRINT("~w -> GStop: ~p",
  701:             [?FUNCTION_NAME, GStop]),
  702:     Diff4 = (GStop - GStart) div 4,
  703:     ?IPRINT("~w -> Diff4: ~p",
  704:             [?FUNCTION_NAME, Diff4]),
  705:     GStart2 = GStart + Diff4,
  706:     GStop2  = GStop - Diff4,
  707:     if 
  708: 	GStop2 > GStart2 ->
  709: 	    ok;
  710: 	true ->
  711:             ?EPRINT("~w -> invalid diff", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  712: 	    ?FAIL({date_calc_failure, GStart2, GStop2})
  713:     end,
  714:     
  715:     Start2 = calendar:gregorian_seconds_to_datetime(GStart2),
  716:     Stop2  = calendar:gregorian_seconds_to_datetime(GStop2),
  717:     
  718:     Out3 = join(Dir, "snmp_text-3.txt"),
  719:     ?IPRINT("~w -> do the convert to a text file when"
  720:             "~n   Start2: ~p"
  721:             "~n   Stop2:  ~p"
  722:             "~n   Out3:   ~p",
  723:             [?FUNCTION_NAME, Start2, Stop2, Out3]),
  724:     ok = snmp:log_to_txt(Dir, [], Out3, Log, File, Start2, Stop2),
  725: 
  726:     {ok, #file_info{size = Size3}} = file:read_file_info(Out3),
  727:     ?IPRINT("~w -> text file size: ~p",
  728:             [?FUNCTION_NAME, Size3]),
  729:     validate_size(Size3, {l, Size1a}),    
  730: 
  731:     ?IPRINT("~w -> close log", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  732:     ok = snmp_log:close(Log),
  733: 
  734:     ?IPRINT("~w -> done", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  735:     ok.
  736: 
  737: 
  738: %%======================================================================
  739: %% Start a logger-process that logs messages with a certain interval.
  740: %% Start a reader-process that reads messages from the log at a certain
  741: %% point of time.
  742: %%
  743: %% Test: ts:run(snmp, snmp_log_test, log_to_txt2, [batch]).
  744: 
  745: log_to_txt3(suite) -> 
  746:     [];
  747: log_to_txt3(doc) -> 
  748:     "Log to txt file from a different process than which "
  749: 	"opened and wrote the log";
  750: log_to_txt3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  751:     ?P(?FUNCTION_NAME),
  752:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  753:     Pre  = fun() ->
  754:                    put(sname,     ?FUNCTION_NAME),
  755:                    put(verbosity, debug),
  756:                    Dir    = ?config(log_dir,     Config),
  757:                    Factor = ?config(snmp_factor, Config),
  758:                    {Dir, Factor}
  759:            end,
  760:     TC   = fun({Dir, Factor}) ->
  761:                    do_log_to_txt3(Dir, Factor)
  762:            end,
  763:     Post = fun(_) ->
  764:                    ok
  765:            end,
  766:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
  767: 
  768: do_log_to_txt3(Dir, Factor) ->
  769:     ?IPRINT("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  770: 
  771:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  772: 
  773:     Name    = "snmp_test_l2t3",
  774:     LogFile = join(Dir, "snmp_test_l2t3.log"),
  775:     TxtFile = join(Dir, "snmp_test_l2t3.txt"),
  776:     Meg     = 1024*1024,
  777:     Size    = {10*Meg, 10},
  778:     Repair  = true,
  779: 
  780:     StdMibDir = filename:join(code:priv_dir(snmp), "mibs") ++ "/",
  781:     Mibs = [join(StdMibDir, "SNMPv2-MIB")],
  782: 
  783:     ?IPRINT("~w -> create log writer process", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  784:     {ok, Log, Logger} =
  785:         log_writer_start(Name, LogFile, Size, Repair, Factor),
  786: 
  787:     ?IPRINT("~w -> create log reader process", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  788:     {ok, Reader} = log_reader_start(),
  789: 
  790:     ?IPRINT("~w -> wait some time", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  791:     ?SLEEP(5000),
  792: 
  793:     ?IPRINT("~w -> display (log) info", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  794:     log_writer_info(Logger),
  795: 
  796:     ?IPRINT("~w -> instruct the log writer to sleep some", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  797:     ok = log_writer_sleep(Logger, 5000),
  798: 
  799:     ?IPRINT("~w -> instruct the log reader to log to txt", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  800:     ?DBG("log_to_txt3 -> ", []),
  801:     Res = 
  802: 	log_reader_log_to(Reader, 
  803: 			  fun() -> 
  804: 				  I = disk_log:info(Log),
  805: 				  T1 = snmp_misc:now(ms),
  806: 				  R = snmp_log:log_to_txt(Log, LogFile, Dir, 
  807: 							  Mibs, TxtFile),
  808: 				  T2 = snmp_misc:now(ms),
  809: 				  ?IPRINT("Time converting file: ~w ms",
  810:                                           [T2 - T1]),
  811: 				  {R, I}
  812: 			  end),
  813: 
  814:     case Res of
  815: 	{ok, Info} ->
  816:             ?IPRINT("~w -> success: "
  817:                     "~n   Info: ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Info]),
  818: 	    {ok, #file_info{size = FileSize}} =
  819: 		file:read_file_info(TxtFile),
  820:             ?IPRINT("~w -> validate file size: ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, FileSize]),
  821: 	    validate_size(FileSize);
  822: 	{Error, Info} ->
  823: 	    ?EPRINT("~w -> log to txt failed: "
  824:                     "~n   Error: ~p"
  825:                     "~n   Info:  ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Error, Info]),
  826: 	    ?FAIL({log_lo_txt_failed, Error, Info})
  827:     end,
  828: 
  829:     ?IPRINT("~w -> instruct the log writer to stop", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  830:     log_writer_stop(Logger),
  831: 
  832:     ?DBG("log_to_txt3 -> instruct the log writer to stop", []),
  833:     log_reader_stop(Reader),
  834: 
  835:     ?DBG("log_to_txt3 -> done", []),
  836:     ok.
  837: 
  838: 
  839: validate_size(0 = A) ->
  840:     ?EPRINT("Size validation failed: "
  841:             "~n   A: ~p", [A]),
  842:     ?FAIL(invalid_size);
  843: validate_size(_) ->
  844:     ok.
  845: 
  846: validate_size(0 = A, B) ->
  847:     ?EPRINT("Size validation failed: "
  848:             "~n   A: ~p"
  849:             "~n   B: ~p", [A, B]),
  850:     ?FAIL(invalid_size);
  851: validate_size(A, {eq, A}) ->
  852:     ok;
  853: validate_size(A, {le, B}) when A =< B ->
  854:     ok;
  855: validate_size(A, {l, B}) when A < B ->
  856:     ok;
  857: validate_size(A, B) ->
  858:     ?EPRINT("Size validation failed: "
  859:             "~n   A: ~p"
  860:             "~n   B: ~p", [A, B]),
  861:     ?FAIL({invalid_size, A, B}).
  862: 
  863:     
  864: %%======================================================================
  865: %% Internal functions
  866: %%======================================================================
  867: 
  868: log_writer_start(Name, File, Size, Repair, Factor) ->
  869:     {Pid, _} = spawn_monitor(?MODULE, log_writer_main, 
  870: 		             [Name, File, Size, Repair, self(), Factor]),
  871:     receive
  872: 	{log, Log, Pid} ->
  873: 	    {ok, Log, Pid};
  874: 	{'DOWN', _MRef, process, Pid, Reason} ->
  875: 	    {error, Reason}
  876:     after 30000 ->
  877: 	    Msg  = receive Any -> Any after 0 -> nothing end,
  878: 	    Info = (catch process_info(Pid)),
  879: 	    exit({failed_starting_writer, timeout, Msg, Info})
  880:     end.
  881: 
  882: log_writer_stop(Pid) ->
  883:     Pid ! {stop, self()},
  884:     _T1 = snmp_misc:now(ms),
  885:     receive
  886: 	{'DOWN', _MRef, process, Pid, normal} ->
  887: 	    _T2 = snmp_misc:now(ms),
  888: 	    ?IPRINT("it took ~w ms to stop the writer", [_T2 - _T1]),
  889: 	    ok
  890:     after 60000 ->
  891: 	    Msg  = receive Any -> Any after 0 -> nothing end,
  892: 	    Info = (catch process_info(Pid)),
  893: 	    ?IPRINT("failed stop writer - kill it: "
  894: 	    	    "~n      Msg:  ~p"
  895: 	    	    "~n      Info: ~p", [Msg, Info]),
  896: 	    exit(Pid, kill),
  897: 	    ok
  898:     end.
  899: 
  900: log_writer_info(Pid) ->
  901:     Pid ! {info, self()}.
  902: 
  903: log_writer_sleep(Pid, Time) ->
  904:     Pid ! {sleep, Time, self()},
  905:     _T1 = snmp_misc:now(ms),
  906:     receive 
  907: 	{sleeping, Pid} ->
  908: 	    _T2 = snmp_misc:now(ms),
  909: 	    ?IPRINT("it took ~w ms to put the writer to sleep", [_T2 - _T1]),
  910: 	    ok;
  911: 	{'DOWN', _MRef, process, Pid, Reason} ->
  912: 	    _T2 = snmp_misc:now(ms),
  913: 	    ?IPRINT("writer error while attempting to put it to sleep (~w): "
  914: 	            "~n      ~p", [_T2 - _T1, Reason]),
  915: 	    {error, Reason}
  916:     after 60000 ->
  917: 	    Msg  = receive Any -> Any after 0 -> nothing end,
  918: 	    Info = (catch process_info(Pid)),
  919: 	    ?IPRINT("failed to put writer to sleep - kill it"),
  920: 	    exit(Pid, kill),
  921: 	    exit({failed_put_writer_to_sleep, timeout, Msg, Info})
  922:     end.
  923: 
  924: log_writer_main(Name, File, Size, Repair, P, Factor) ->
  925:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  926:     put(tname, "LOG-WRITER"),
  927:     {ok, Log} = snmp_log:create(Name, File, Size, Repair),
  928:     P ! {log, Log, self()},
  929:     Msgs   = lists:flatten(lists:duplicate(if 
  930:                                                (Factor > 10) -> 1;
  931:                                                true   -> 10 div Factor
  932:                                            end,
  933:                                            messages())),
  934:     Addr   = ?LOCALHOST(),
  935:     Port   = 162,
  936:     Logger =  fun(Packet) ->
  937: 		     ok = snmp_log:log(Log, Packet, Addr, Port)
  938: 	      end,
  939:     BatchLogger = fun(Time) ->
  940: 			  lists:foreach(Logger, Msgs),
  941: 			  ?SLEEP(Time),
  942: 			  ok
  943: 		  end,
  944:     log_writer(Log, BatchLogger, P).
  945: 
  946: log_writer(Log, Fun, P) ->
  947:     ?IPRINT("entry"),
  948:     receive 
  949: 	{stop, P} ->
  950: 	    ?IPRINT("received stop request"),
  951: 	    ok = snmp_log:close(Log),
  952: 	    exit(normal);
  953: 	{info, P} ->
  954: 	    ?IPRINT("received info request"),
  955: 	    {ok, Info} = snmp_log:info(Log),
  956: 	    display_info(Info),
  957: 	    log_writer(Log, Fun, P);
  958: 	{sleep, Time, P} ->
  959: 	    ?IPRINT("received sleep (~w) request", [Time]),
  960: 	    P ! {sleeping, self()},
  961: 	    ?SLEEP(Time),
  962: 	    ?IPRINT("done sleeping"),
  963: 	    log_writer(Log, Fun, P);
  964: 	ELSE ->
  965: 	    ?EPRINT("Received unknown message: "
  966:                     "~n   ~p", [ELSE]),
  967: 	    log_writer(Log, Fun, P)
  968:     after 1000 ->
  969: 	    ?IPRINT("log some messages"),
  970: 	    To = lists:duplicate(100, 100),
  971: 	    lists:foreach(Fun, To),
  972: 	    log_writer(Log, Fun, P)
  973:     end.
  974: 
  975: 
  976: %% --
  977: 
  978: log_reader_start() ->
  979:     Pid = spawn_link(?MODULE, log_reader_main, [self()]),
  980:     _T1 = snmp_misc:now(ms),
  981:     receive 
  982: 	{started, Pid} ->
  983: 	    _T2 = snmp_misc:now(ms),
  984: 	    ?IPRINT("it took ~w ms to start the reader", [_T2 - _T1]),
  985: 	    {ok, Pid};
  986: 	{'EXIT', Pid, Reason} ->
  987: 	    {error, Reason}
  988:     after 1000 ->
  989: 	    error
  990:     end.
  991: 
  992: log_reader_stop(Pid) ->
  993:     Pid ! {stop, self()},
  994:     _T1 = snmp_misc:now(ms),
  995:     receive
  996: 	{'EXIT', Pid, normal} ->
  997: 	    _T2 = snmp_misc:now(ms),
  998: 	    ?IPRINT("it took ~w ms to stop the reader", [_T2 - _T1]),
  999: 	    ok
 1000:     after 1000 ->
 1001: 	    Msg = receive Any -> Any after 0 -> nothing end,
 1002: 	    exit({failed_stopping_reader, timeout, Msg})
 1003:     end.
 1004: 
 1005: log_reader_log_to(Pid, LogToFun) when is_function(LogToFun) ->
 1006:     Pid ! {log_to, LogToFun, self()},
 1007:     receive
 1008: 	{log_to_reply, Res, Pid} ->
 1009: 	    Res
 1010:     end.
 1011: 
 1012: log_reader_main(P) ->
 1013:     put(tname, "LOG-READER"),
 1014:     P ! {started, self()},
 1015:     log_reader(P).
 1016: 
 1017: log_reader(P) ->
 1018:     ?IPRINT("entry"),
 1019:     receive 
 1020: 	{stop, P} ->
 1021: 	    ?IPRINT("received stop request"),
 1022: 	    exit(normal);
 1023: 	{log_to, F, P} ->
 1024: 	    ?IPRINT("received log_to request"),
 1025: 	    Res = F(),
 1026: 	    ?IPRINT("done with log_to - sending reply"),
 1027: 	    P ! {log_to_reply, Res, self()}, 
 1028: 	    log_reader(P);
 1029: 	ELSE ->
 1030: 	    ?EPRINT("Received unknown message: "
 1031:                     "~n   ~p", [ELSE]),
 1032: 	    log_reader(P)
 1033:     end.
 1034:     
 1035: 
 1036: %%======================================================================
 1037: 
 1038: check_notify() ->
 1039:     receive
 1040: 	{disk_log, Node, LogName, Info} ->
 1041: 	    io:format("disk_log notify: "
 1042: 		      "~n   Node:    ~p"
 1043: 		      "~n   LogName: ~s"
 1044: 		      "~n   Info:    ~p"
 1045: 		      "~n", [Node, LogName, Info]),
 1046: 	    check_notify()
 1047:     after 1000 ->
 1048: 	    done
 1049:     end.
 1050: 
 1051: 
 1052: messages() ->
 1053:     [get_next_request('version-1', "all-rights", 
 1054: 		      [1,13], 1, 1101),
 1055:      get_response('version-1', "all-rights", 
 1056: 		  [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,1,0], 
 1057: 		  'OCTET STRING', "Erlang SNMP agent",
 1058: 		  1, 1101),
 1059:      get_request('version-1', "all-rights", 
 1060: 		 [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,1,0], 1, 1102),
 1061:      get_response('version-1', "all-rights", 
 1062: 		  [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,1,0], 
 1063: 		  'OCTET STRING', "Erlang SNMP agent",
 1064: 		  1, 1102),
 1065:      set_request('version-1', "all-rights", 
 1066: 		 [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,6,0], 
 1067: 		 'OCTET STRING', "new_value",
 1068: 		 1, 1003),
 1069:      get_response('version-1', "all-rights", 
 1070: 		  [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,6,0], 
 1071: 		  'OCTET STRING', "new_value",
 1072: 		  1, 1103),
 1073:      get_bulk_request("all-rights", 1104),
 1074:      bulk_get_response('version-1', "all-rights", 
 1075: 		       [48,29,6,8,43,6,1,2,1,1,1,0,4,17,69,114,108,97,
 1076: 			110,103,32,83,78,77,80,32,97,103,101,110,116,
 1077: 			48,7,6,3,43,7,1,130,0], 1104),
 1078:      inform_request("all-rights", 1105),
 1079:      get_response('version-1', "all-rights", 
 1080: 		  [{[1,3,6,1,2,1,1,3,0],
 1081: 		    'TimeTicks',
 1082: 		    4046,
 1083: 		    1},
 1084: 		   {[1,3,6,1,6,3,1,1,4,1,0],
 1085: 		    'OBJECT IDENTIFIER',
 1086: 		    [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,0,1],2}],
 1087: 		  1105),
 1088:      snmpv2_trap("all-rights", 1106),
 1089:      trap("all-rights")].
 1090: 
 1091: 
 1092: get_request(Vsn, Community, Oid, OrgIdx, ReqId) ->
 1093:     Varbind = #varbind{oid          = Oid, 
 1094: 		       variabletype = 'NULL',
 1095: 		       value        = 'NULL',
 1096: 		       org_index    = OrgIdx},
 1097:     Pdu     = #pdu{type         = 'get-response',
 1098: 		   request_id   = ReqId, 
 1099: 		   error_status = noError, 
 1100: 		   error_index  = 0,
 1101: 		   varbinds     = [Varbind]},
 1102:     enc_message(Vsn, Community, Pdu).
 1103: 
 1104: get_next_request(Vsn, Community, Oid, OrgIdx, ReqId) ->
 1105:     Varbind = #varbind{oid          = Oid, 
 1106: 		       variabletype = 'NULL',
 1107: 		       value        = 'NULL',
 1108: 		       org_index    = OrgIdx},
 1109:     Pdu     = #pdu{type         = 'get-next-request',
 1110: 		   request_id   = ReqId, 
 1111: 		   error_status = noError, 
 1112: 		   error_index  = 0,
 1113: 		   varbinds     = [Varbind]},
 1114:     enc_message(Vsn, Community, Pdu).
 1115: 
 1116: bulk_get_response(Vsn, Community, Bulk, ReqId) ->
 1117:     Pdu     = #pdu{type         = 'get-response',
 1118: 		   request_id   = ReqId,
 1119: 		   error_status = noError,
 1120: 		   error_index  = 0,
 1121: 		   varbinds     = Bulk},
 1122:     enc_message(Vsn, Community, Pdu).
 1123:     
 1124: get_response(Vsn, Community, VarbindData, ReqId) ->
 1125:     Varbinds = varbinds(VarbindData, []),
 1126:     Pdu     = #pdu{type         = 'get-response',
 1127: 		   request_id   = ReqId,
 1128: 		   error_status = noError,
 1129: 		   error_index  = 0,
 1130: 		   varbinds     = Varbinds},
 1131:     enc_message(Vsn, Community, Pdu).
 1132:     
 1133: get_response(Vsn, Community, Oid, Type, Value, OrgIdx, ReqId) ->
 1134:     Varbind = #varbind{oid          = Oid, 
 1135: 		       variabletype = Type,
 1136: 		       value        = Value,
 1137: 		       org_index    = OrgIdx},
 1138:     Pdu     = #pdu{type         = 'get-response',
 1139: 		   request_id   = ReqId,
 1140: 		   error_status = noError,
 1141: 		   error_index  = 0,
 1142: 		   varbinds     = [Varbind]},
 1143:     enc_message(Vsn, Community, Pdu).
 1144: 
 1145: set_request(Vsn, Community, Oid, Type, Value, OrgIdx, ReqId) ->
 1146:     Varbind = #varbind{oid          = Oid, 
 1147: 		       variabletype = Type,
 1148: 		       value        = Value,
 1149: 		       org_index    = OrgIdx},
 1150:     Pdu     = #pdu{type         = 'set-request',
 1151: 		   request_id   = ReqId,
 1152: 		   error_status = noError,
 1153: 		   error_index  = 0,
 1154: 		   varbinds     = [Varbind]},
 1155:     enc_message(Vsn, Community, Pdu).
 1156: 
 1157: 
 1158: get_bulk_request(Community, ReqId) ->
 1159:     Varbinds = [#varbind{oid          = [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,1],
 1160: 			 variabletype = 'NULL',
 1161: 			 value        = 'NULL',
 1162: 			 org_index    = 1},
 1163: 		#varbind{oid          = [1,3,7,1],
 1164: 			 variabletype = 'NULL',
 1165: 			 value        = 'NULL',
 1166: 			 org_index    = 2}],
 1167:     Pdu = #pdu{type         = 'get-bulk-request',
 1168: 	       request_id   = ReqId,
 1169: 	       error_status = 1,
 1170: 	       error_index  = 1,
 1171: 	       varbinds     = Varbinds},
 1172:     enc_message('version-2', Community, Pdu).
 1173: 
 1174: inform_request(Community, ReqId) ->
 1175:     Varbinds = [#varbind{oid          = [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,3,0],
 1176: 			 variabletype = 'TimeTicks',
 1177: 			 value        = 4046,
 1178: 			 org_index    = 1},
 1179: 		#varbind{oid          = [1,3,6,1,6,3,1,1,4,1,0],
 1180: 			 variabletype = 'OBJECT IDENTIFIER',
 1181: 			 value        = [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,0,1],
 1182: 			 org_index    = 2}],
 1183:     Pdu = #pdu{type         = 'inform-request',
 1184: 	       request_id   = ReqId,
 1185: 	       error_status = noError,
 1186: 	       error_index  = 0,
 1187: 	       varbinds     = Varbinds},
 1188:     enc_message('version-2', Community, Pdu).
 1189: 
 1190: snmpv2_trap(Community, ReqId) ->
 1191:     Varbinds = [#varbind{oid          = [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,3,0],
 1192: 			 variabletype = 'TimeTicks',
 1193: 			 value        = 3945,
 1194: 			 org_index    = 1},
 1195: 		#varbind{oid          = [1,3,6,1,6,3,1,1,4,1,0],
 1196: 			 variabletype = 'OBJECT IDENTIFIER',
 1197: 			 value        = [1,3,6,1,2,1,11,1],
 1198: 			 org_index    = 2}],
 1199:     Pdu = #pdu{type         = 'snmpv2-trap',
 1200: 	       request_id   = ReqId,
 1201: 	       error_status = noError,
 1202: 	       error_index  = 0,
 1203: 	       varbinds     = Varbinds},
 1204:     enc_message('version-2', Community, Pdu).
 1205: 
 1206: % report() ->
 1207: %     Varbind = #varbind{oid          = ?snmpUnknownPDUHandlers,
 1208: % 		       variabletype = 'Counter32',
 1209: % 		       value        = 111},
 1210: %     Pdu = #pdu{type         = report, 
 1211: % 	       request_id   = 991199,
 1212: % 	       error_status = noError, 
 1213: % 	       error_index  = 0,
 1214: % 	       varbinds     = [Varbind]},
 1215: %     enc_message('version-3', Community, Pdu).
 1216: 
 1217: trap(Community) ->
 1218:     Enterp    = [1,3,6,1,2,1,1],
 1219:     Oid       = [1,3,6,1,2,1,1,4,0],
 1220:     Type      = 'OCTET STRING',
 1221:     Value     = "{mbj,eklas}@erlang.ericsson.se",
 1222:     SysUpTime = 4379, 
 1223:     Spec      = 1,
 1224:     Generic   = 6, 
 1225:     AgentIp   = [127,0,0,1],
 1226:     trap(Community, Enterp, Oid, Type, Value, SysUpTime, 
 1227: 	 Spec, Generic, AgentIp, 1).
 1228: 
 1229: %% V1 trap
 1230: trap(Community, Enterp, Oid, Type, Value, SysUpTime, 
 1231:      Spec, Generic, AgentIp, OrgIdx) ->
 1232:     Varbind = #varbind{oid          = Oid, 
 1233: 		       variabletype = Type, 
 1234: 		       value        = Value,
 1235: 		       org_index    = OrgIdx},
 1236:     Trap = #trappdu{enterprise    = Enterp,
 1237: 		    agent_addr    = AgentIp,
 1238: 		    generic_trap  = Generic,
 1239: 		    specific_trap = Spec,
 1240: 		    time_stamp    = SysUpTime,
 1241: 		    varbinds      = [Varbind]},
 1242:     enc_message('version-1', Community, Trap).
 1243: 
 1244: varbinds([], Varbinds) ->
 1245:     lists:reverse(Varbinds);
 1246: varbinds([{Oid, Type, Value, Idx}|T], Acc) ->
 1247:     Varbind = #varbind{oid          = Oid, 
 1248: 		       variabletype = Type, 
 1249: 		       value        = Value,
 1250: 		       org_index    = Idx},
 1251:     varbinds(T, [Varbind|Acc]).
 1252: 
 1253: enc_message(Vsn, Community, Pdu) ->
 1254:     PduBytes = snmp_pdus:enc_pdu(Pdu),
 1255:     Msg      = #message{version = Vsn,
 1256: 			vsn_hdr = Community,
 1257: 			data    = PduBytes},
 1258:     list_to_binary(snmp_pdus:enc_message_only(Msg)).
 1259: 
 1260: display_info(Info) ->
 1261:     {SinceOpened, SinceLastInfo} = get_info(no_overflows, Info, {-1,-1}),
 1262:     CurrentFile = get_info(current_file, Info, -1),
 1263:     NoItems = get_info(no_current_items, Info, -1),
 1264:     NoBytes = get_info(no_current_bytes, Info, -1),
 1265:     ?NPRINT("Disk log info: "
 1266:             "~n   Number of filled since opened:    ~p"
 1267:             "~n   Number of filled since last info: ~p"
 1268:             "~n   Current file:                     ~p"
 1269:             "~n   Number of items in file:          ~p"
 1270:             "~n   Number of bytes in file:          ~p", 
 1271:             [SinceOpened, SinceLastInfo, CurrentFile, NoItems, NoBytes]).
 1272: 
 1273: get_info(Key, Info, Def) ->
 1274:     case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Info) of
 1275: 	{value, {Key, Val}} ->
 1276: 	    Val;
 1277: 	false ->
 1278: 	    Def
 1279:     end.
 1280: 
 1281: join(D, F) ->
 1282:     filename:join(D, F).
 1283:
